name: Trip to Hetauda
description: Trip to Hetauda is the special trip to those travelers who want to enjoy both scenic beauty as well as cultural beauty.  The trip provide you the good combination of both nature as well as religion of Nepalese. Here, you can see all sorts of people living together. Hetauda is in fact enrolled with the different sorts of diversification in both living style as well as culture. The trip provide you to collect different sorts of experience from different places, people. The natural beauty of Hetauda is very attractive. There are several places which can be explored. Choosing Hetauda for your trip, you will never regret. Along with the different places to visit it also let you to spend your days comfortably.
